captions.text:
Even though you play as Luigi in New Super
Luigi U, did you know there are 82 other Luigis

lurking all over the Mushroom Kingdom? Yep,
there's one hidden in each of the levels

Some of them are easy to spot, but others
are pretty well hidden

Now we've already put together a video showing
off all 82 of them, but that may not be enough

if you want to track them down yourself, so
this time we'll show exactly how to find each
and every one of them. Yep, all 82.
So let's get started!

Really? You really shouldn't need any help
in Acorn-Plains-1

In Acorn-Plains 2, you'll have to ground-pound
through the bricks just before the flag pole
to reveal it

Check the bottom-left of the final cog in
Acorn Plains-Tower to located this Luigi

Look for a Luigi-shaped spot on the structure
just before the POW block in Acorn Plains

In Acorn-Plains 4, Work your way up this gap
to a warp pipe that leads to the 3rd Star
Coin area, as well as a giant 8-bit Luigi

You can't miss the fourth bush in Acorn-Plains
5 that's shaped like Luigi

Before venturing through the boss door in
Acorn Plain's castle, look for an 8-Bit Luigi
above a hidden block on the right

In Acorn Plains' Secret Level, look for an
8-bit Luigi when you reach the Red Ring, next
to the yellow pipe before it swings outward

Look for a Luigi fossil in the ground just
before the P-Switch in Layer Cake Desert 1

In Layer Cake Desert 2, you'll need to use
the P-acorn to fly above the first wall too

a secret shortcut that leads past a giant
8-bit Luigi

Clear out the Piranha Plant from the first
exit pipe in Acorn Plains-3 to find a small
8-bit Luigi

As you climb the final section of Layer Cake
Desert's Tower, look for an 8-bit Luigi on
the left

As Mini Luigi, take the Mini Warp Pipe in
Layer Cake Desert 4 then ground-pound the
statue inside to reveal another 8-bit Luigi

You'll find another 8-bit Luigi on a high
wall just before the 3rd Star Coin In Layer
Cake Desert 5,

When you reach this trio of statues in Layer
Cake Desert 6, take a close look at the middle
one

After grabbing the Second Star Coin in Layer
Cake Desert's Castle, look at what's left
behind

You'll want to clear out the coins and enemies
just before the end of Layer Cake Desert's

Secret level to get a good look at an 8-bit
Luigi

Take this somewhat concealed warp pipe in
Sparking Waters-1 to find a large 8-bit swimming
Luigi

You'll find an 8-bit Luigi shortly after the
3rd Star Coin in Sparkling Waters-2

In Sparkling Water's Tower, keep a eye out
for a large 8-Bit Luigi that you quickly pass
by while riding the 2nd lift

Once inside Sparkling Water's Ghost Ship,
drop into the water and check the left wall
for a swimming 8-bit Super Luigi

In Sparkling Waters-3, look for an 8-but Luigi
between the water spouts directly beneath
the Red Ring

Turn left at the very start of Sparkling-Waters
4 to find Luigi's head plastered on the wall

For for a swimming 8-bit Luigi near the exit
pipe of Sparking Waters 5.

When you reach the underwater section of Sparkling
Water's Castle, first activate the P-Switch,

then quickly swim to grab the coins above
the exit pipe before they turn back into bricks
to reveal a swimming 8-bit Luigi

When you reach the exit pipe of Sparkling
Water's Secret Level, look for an 8-bit Luigi
in the bottom-right corner

The hidden Luigi in Frosted Glacier-1 is a
little sneaky. You'll have to earn yourself

a fireworks show by grabbing the flagpole
at the exact moment when the last two numbers

in the level's timer match, such as the 44
shown here. This will allow you to walk past

the small castle to find Luigi...in snowman
form

You'll find an 8-bit Luigi clinging to the
platform just before the 3rd Star Coin in
Frosted Glacier 2

Wall-jump up the shaft at the very start of
Frosted Glacier's tower to find a hidden area
with a crouching 8-bit Luigi

In Frosted Glacier 3, look for a hidden area
in the right wall here that contains a warp

pipe. You'll find an ice sculpture of Luigi
inside

Check the icon on the Bullet Bill launcher
just before the end of Frosted Glacier 4 to
spot Luigi's head

In Frosted Glacier 5, use the Penguin suit
to slide through the bricks by the exit pipes

then explore the hidden alcove above for another
8-bit Luigi

After passing the second circle of Boos in
Frosted Glacier's Ghost House, look closely

at the spider web in the corner to spot a
familiar face

During the Final Thwomp-sequence in Frosted
Glacier's Castle, look in the gap left behind
by the 5th one to spot an 8-bit Luigi

At the very start of Frosted Glacier's secret
level, look for a hidden block directly above

you, then another one above that, which is
right below an 8-bit Luigi

Check out the back of Soda Jungle's Airship
for an unexpected Luigi appearance

In Soda Jungle-1, use these Koopa Troopas
to destroy the lower left block, revealing
an b-bit Luigi

Active this ? Block with a ground-pound, then
hit the Switch that follows to reveal a path

below to a warp pipe that leads to Soda Jungle-2's
secret exit. Then just grab hold of the flagpole

to reveal an 8-bit Luigi behind the lowerd
flag

Look for Luigi's head on the platform right
next to the first Star Coin in Soda-Jungle

Near the end of Soda Jungle's Tower, look
for a gap in this wall where you'll find a
crouching 8-bit Luigi

As Flying Squirrel Luigi, glide over the gap
past the main exit door in Soda Jungle's Ghost

House to find a picture of Luigi hanging on
the far wall

Use the Blue swinging pipe at the end of Soda
Jungle-4 to reach the red pipe above to be

taken to a secret area containing a painting
of Luigi

Grab the second Star Coin in Soda Jungle-5
to cause the statue above to drop. Then swim

up right next to it to find a hidden warp
pipe which will take you to a secret area
containing a giant 8-bit Luigi

A short ways before the third Star Coin in
Soda Jungle-6, you'll find Luigi;s face in
the roots of this platform

After exiting the yellow pipe just before
the end of Soda Jungle-7, explore a hidden
alcove on the left to find an 8-bit Luigi

Look for another 8-Bit Luigi between the lava
waves directly beneath your starting point
in Soda Jungle's Castle

Shortly after the second Star Coin in Soda
Jungle's secret level, look for an 8-bit Luigi
near the low-flying Para Beetles

In Rock-Candy Mines 1, hop into a hidden area
just above the first Star Coin to find an
8-bit Luigi

After passing the Red Ring in Rock Candy-Mines-2,
look for an 8-bit Luigi at the top of the
second pole

In Rock Candy Mines first Tower, reveal some
hidden blocks in the left gap here to cause

the rolling enemies to break through the bricks,
allowing you to reach the left pipe

After warping, you'll find Luigi's mug on
the wall

Shortly after the green ring in Rock Candy
Mines-3, take out the first enemy on the right

to discover an 8-bit Luigi he was covering
up

Jump over the two glowing blocks at the very
start of Rock Candy Mines-4 to find an 8-bit
Luigi on the other side

Look for an outline of Luigi in the rock wall
about halfway through Rock Candy Mines-5\

You'll spot an 8-bit Luigi in Rock Candy Mines
6 while jumping for the second Star Coin

Before heading through the Boss door in Rock
Candy Mine's second Tower, you'll discover

a couple levels of hidden blocks that lead
up to an 8-bit Luigi on the ceiling

Look for a hidden area behind this hammer
brother in Rock Candy Mines-7 to find an 8-bit
Luigi

After triggering the second switch in Rock
Candy Mines Castle, look for an 8-bit Luigi
on the lower level

After grabbing Star Coin #2 in Meringue Clouds-1,
take out the second hammer brother to find
another 8-bit Luigi

In Meringue Clouds 2, wait for the fourth
Chain Chomp to face left before freeing him

so he plows through the bricks revealing yet
another 8-Bit Luigi

When you reach the end of Meringue Clouds-3,
jump high along the left wall to discover

a hidden warp pipe that'll take you to a secret
area with a large 8-bit Luigi

Keep an eye out early into Meringue Cloud's
Tower for a Luigi on the wall

In Meringue Cloud's Ghost House, ride the
second large platform down then head through

a hidden door on the left that leads to the
level's secret Luigi--but not just any Luigi,
but the ghost-busting one from Luigi's Mansion!

Take out the Piranha Plant just past the Red
Ring in Meringue Clouds 4 to reveal an 8-bit
Luigi

There's no missing the giant cloud-Luigi creeping
in the background of Meringue Clouds-5.

Disperse the fog at the start of Meringue
Clouds-6 to reveal an 8-Bit Luigi

You can't miss the giant Luigi on the wall
just before blasting to the Ludwig's airship
in Meringue Cloud's Castle

In Meringue Cloud's Airship, look for a hidden
area just below the POW block that contains
some secret Luigi artwork

In Peach's Castle-1, wait for the fireballs
here to break through the blocks, allowing

you to reach a hidden warp pipe in the top-right
corner which will take you to the secret flagpole,
where you'll find a statue of Luigi just beyond

Look for an 8-bit Luigi right next to the
3rd Lava Monster in peach's Castle-2

Just before the second Star Coin in Peach's
Castle-3, enter this hidden area and break
the center brick to reveal an 8-bit Luigi

In Peach's Castle-4, ride the first row of
platforms into a secret passage on the left

that'll take you to a hidden area. Now look
for another secret area on the left here that
contains an 8-bit Luigi

Move fast to discover another 8-Bit Luigi
just below the second door in Peach's Castle's

Castle before it's obscured by the rising
lava

After passing the second Star Coin in Peach's
Castle's The Final Battle, look for Luigi's
face on the center rivet of this platform

You'll spot an 8-Bit Luigi on the ceiling
while jumping the first Fuzzy in SuperStar
Road 1

When you reach the end of the second running
sequence of SuperStar Road 2, quickly break

through the blocks here to reveal an 8-Bit
Luigi

In Superstar Road 3, have the Cheep Chomp
take out the bricks just below the red ring
to reveal another 8-bit Luigi

After passing the green ring in SuperStar
Road 4, keep an eye out for an 8-bit Luigi
along the right wall

Shortly after the second Star Coin in Superstar
Road 5, reveal a hidden block among the coins

here to find a beanstalk that leads to a secret
area.

There you'll find an 8-bit..wait a second,
holy crap, a 16-bit Luigi! MIND BLOWING

If you can somehow make it to the end of SuperStar
Road 6 as Super Luigi, you can ground-pound

through the final set of bricks to reveal...an
8-bit Luigi. I should have known better

When you reach the giant field of fuzzies
near the end of SuperStar Road 7, use your

fire power to take down the one in the bottom
row, 3rd from the right to reveal--of course--an
8-bit Luigi

When you reach the end of SuperStar Road 8,
carefully work your way down to a hidden area

in the bottom-right corner to find but what
else--another freakin' 8-bit Luigi

You can't miss the gigantic 8-Bit Luigi that
you glide past in SuperStar Road 9

And don't forget about the sweet Luigi cutout
at the end of the level that--amazingly--isn't
8-bit

Thanks for watching and make sure to stay-tuned
to GameXplain.com for more New Super Luigi
U video guides and other things gaming too

title: Find all 82 Hidden Luigi Locations in New Super Luigi U - Guide & Walkthrough
